statements: SELECT * FROM components;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE component_type = 'CPU' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_name, component_type, quantity FROM components WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY component_name;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS largest_quantity FROM components;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT component_name, component_type FROM components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY component_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT component_type FROM components WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT component_name, supplier_id FROM components WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND component_type = 'GPU';
SELECT component_id, component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT component_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM components ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyComponents;
SELECT component_id, component_name, quantity FROM RenewableEnergyComponents WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity_stocked < 50 AND component_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, component_name, quantity_stocked FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Inventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Inventory.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyComponents WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM RenewableEnergyComponents WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE LENGTH(contact_number) > 10;
SELECT component_name, quantity_stocked FROM RenewableEnergyComponents JOIN Inventory ON RenewableEnergyComponents.component_id = Inventory.component_id;

SELECT component_name, supplier_name, quantity_stocked FROM RenewableEnergyComponents JOIN Inventory ON RenewableEnergyComponents.component_id = Inventory.component_id JOIN Suppliers ON Inventory.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY quantity_stocked DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_components
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM energy_components WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT component_name, component_type, quantity FROM energy_components WHERE component_type = 'Cable' AND quantity < 5
SELECT * FROM energy_components WHERE component_type = 'Battery'
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM energy_components WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN inventory i ON o.component_id = i.component_id WHERE o.quantity > i.stock_quantity
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31'
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components;
SELECT component_name, component_type, unit_price FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE component_type = 'Solar Panel';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_date, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE component_type = 'Solar Panel';
SELECT component_name, quantity, unit_price FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_price FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN orders ON transactions.order_id = orders.order_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
